articles.author: Nick Bromberg
articles.title: NASCAR moves up start time of Daytona 500 by an hour - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The race will now begin at 2 p.m. ET as there's a chance of rain on Sunday.
articles.content:
The 2025 Daytona 500 will start an hour earlier than originally scheduled.
NASCAR announced Friday that the race would begin at 2 p.m. ET. The race had been scheduled for just after 3 p.m., however … [+1481 chars]
